foreignData.name: Siedefrost-Knoten
foreignData.text:
Sowie der Siedefrost-Knoten ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Insel- oder Gebirge-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt der Siedefrost-Knoten getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {R}.

foreignData.name: Maraña hervicongelada
foreignData.text:
En cuanto la Maraña hervicongelada entre al campo de batalla, puedes mostrar una carta de Isla o de Montaña de tu mano. Si no lo haces, la Maraña hervicongelada entra al campo de batalla girada.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {R}.

foreignData.name: Lacis pyrogel
foreignData.text:
Au moment où le Lacis pyrogel arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez révéler une carte d'île ou de montagne de votre main. Si vous ne le faites pas, le Lacis pyrogel arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}.

foreignData.name: Intreccio Glaciardente
foreignData.text:
Mentre l'Intreccio Glaciardente entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi rivelare una carta Isola o Montagna dalla tua mano. Se non lo fai, l'Intreccio Glaciardente entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}.

foreignData.name: 凍沸の交錯
foreignData.text:
凍沸の交錯が戦場に出るに際し、あなたはあなたの手札から島か山であるカード１枚を公開してもよい。そうしないなら、凍沸の交錯はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。

name: Frostboil Snarl
originalText:
As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

rulings.text: You may reveal any land card with either or both of the appropriate subtypes. It doesn’t have to be a basic land card.
The “Snarl” itself doesn’t have any land subtypes. You can’t reveal one to satisfy the ability of another.
If a land card with an appropriate subtype is entering the battlefield from your hand at the same time as one of these lands, you may reveal the other land to have the “Snarl” enter untapped.
If an effect instructs you to put one of these lands onto the battlefield tapped, it will still enter the battlefield tapped even if you reveal a land card from your hand.

text:
As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
